item.title: all of the good names on pypi are taken by projects that look like this
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm
item.description: all of the good names on pypi are taken by projects that look like this

item.title:
crypto data becomes good if and only if it's prioritized by ecosystem + leadership
crypto data has always been trust-but-verify. but instead of telling ppl to deprioritize data, we should tell ecosystems + leaders to step up and make good data a priority. data = tablestakes
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm
item.description:

item.title:
R to @notnotstorm: beyond slots it's an even more extreme story for accessing cold accounts
caching 100K accounts could make >80% of account accesses super cheap
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm
item.description:
beyond slots it's an even more extreme story for accessing cold accounts

caching 100K accounts could make >80% of account accesses super cheap

item.title:
cache-aware storage pricing would be a nice boost for scaling ethereum L1
if node clients cached 100K storage slots, that could make >50% of all storage reads virtually free (and it would require only 10's of MB's of memory)
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm
item.description:
cache-aware storage pricing would be a nice boost for scaling ethereum L1

if node clients cached 100K storage slots, that could make >50% of all storage reads virtually free (and it would require only 10's of MB's of memory)

item.title:
rust has restored python back to its roots of simplicity, elegance, and effortlessness
python used to be the best at these things, then fell way behind, now it's making a comeback

item.title:
R to @notnotstorm: it took a long time to ensure near equivalence between alloy cryo and ethers cryo
it required us to build a custom testing framework to test 37 datasets under a variety of environments and parameters
there may still be some diffs. will have stability before v1.0
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm
item.description:
it took a long time to ensure near equivalence between alloy cryo and ethers cryo

it required us to build a custom testing framework to test 37 datasets under a variety of environments and parameters

there may still be some diffs. will have stability before v1.0

item.title:
cryo has finally made the upgrade from ethers to alloy 💪 this is the largest upgrade to cryo since launch
massive shoutout to @Yadomin1 for getting this over the line. this is was a big blocker on the path to cryo 1.0 (major updates coming soon)
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm
item.description:
cryo has finally made the upgrade from ethers to alloy 💪 this is the largest upgrade to cryo since launch

massive shoutout to @Yadomin1 for getting this over the line. this is was a big blocker on the path to cryo 1.0 (major updates coming soon)

item.title:
polars will soon be usable in the web browser via pyodide
this enables lots of new possibilities for data web apps
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm
item.description:

item.title:
what are the best ways for an OSS crypto dev to financially support themselves in 2025?
multiple devs asked me this in the past month and I don't have great answers. OSS is still a major tragedy of the commons
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm

item.title:
the paradigm data tools chat is the largest and most active place to discuss crypto data science + data engineering
we cultivated this chat by building sovereign data tools. sovereign data goes beyond open source. it means you can have full control over the entire data pipeline
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm
item.description:

item.title:
the last major increase to ethereum's gas limit was in 2021
in that time, consumer hardware has roughly doubled in speed + capacity. ethereum node clients have also become significantly more performant
pump the gas ⛽⛽
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm
item.description:

pump the gas ⛽⛽

item.title:
in case you missed it, many members of the EF (such as @dankrad, @adietrichs, @nero_eth) and many of the core dev teams, have publicly voiced support for scaling the L1 over the past month
this is a shift from the L2-centric roadmap to a more comprehensive scaling strategy
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm
item.description:

item.title:
a 2 year old raspberry pi barely matches the hardware capabilities of a desktop pc from 15+ years ago
hobbling ethereum to work on rpi's is the wrong point in tradeoff space
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm
